content.description: Starts on a narrow face between a left-facing inside corner and an arete.  Climb the face using the arete (full value) or the insider corner (easier), then pull the overlap on the right (full value) or skirt past it on the arete (easier, more run out) to rap rings at the top.
content.location: 1 route left of Machismo at a small face between a left facing corner and arete.  There is an A with an arrow over it painted on the rock just left of this route.

content.description: Follow bolts.  Crux is low getting to the second bolt. After that 5.11
Climb thin pocket/seem straight up to first bolt and pod. Clip, move left and up to second bolt. Climb to third bolt and move LEFT over third bolt to arete. Lie back arete to top.
Thin technical climbing past the first 3 bolts (crux).  Continue up past a chossy hole to a drilled blasting hole for a good rest.  Finally up sloping holds that are pretty good to the anchor.
content.location: 3rd route in the machismo sector (#30 in the horst guide)

content.description:
Climb left facing corner/slab on trad. Gain roof, move left under roof, clip 1st bolt at 25 '. Follow bolts to 2 bolt anchor. Crux is unlocking sequence to move beyond and just left of first bolt.

 Direct Start: Start below bolt, scramble up to left facing corner and stem up to roof. Move right to first bolt. 5.9(R/X)
content.protection: Nuts, blue alien, pink tricam sized stuff.   Recommend clipping first bolt with 2 slings as the lip is sharp.
content.location: High bolt (20') above double roof. 30' left of "To Cold to Stroke". Just left of Lynn's Chin.

content.description: A long route for Safe Harbor. just follow the bolts. Thoughtful, thin crux at bolts 5 thru 8. Stay right of crux bolts for a touch more difficulty.   Nice Slab climbing followed by roof at the top.   Climb the roof left of last bolt for more fun.
content.protection: Sport. 12 bolts plus 2 more for anchors.
content.location: 40' left of "To Cold to Stroke"   The start looks a little chossy to 1st bolt at 12', but is pretty solid. After that smooth sailing.

climbs.name: How Do Ya' Like Dem Apples?!

content.description: Climb the left facing dihedral passing 2 bolts. Climb right around the small roof then straight up please to 2 bolt anchor.Stay very, very close to the last bolt. Wandering right as some are want to do may result in chossy rock (and climbers) to fall!The rotten, junky crack way to the left is off - not that you'd want to use it anyway
content.location: The left facing dihedral 10' right of 2 cold 2 stroke.

content.description: Start in dihedral to low angle slab, climb through easy terrain to a large distinct block with small roof. Pull said roof and get established on block.  Climb past a few more bolts on slopey feet to anchors. Recommend back cleaning 1st bolt after 2nd is clipped to reduce drag.
content.protection: 8 bolts to anchors with rap rings

content.description: Climb just left of three bolts to anchor.   Balancy and technical. The crack on the right is unnecessary and often filled with poison ivy.
content.location: Climb 4th class ramp 20' right of Machismo to large ledge and first bolt.

climbs.name: Ding-Dong the Wicked Witch is Dead

content.description: Approach the first bolt directly, going left to the "bomber" left hand side pull will feel harder than 5.5. Continue up the route climbing directly to second and then 3rd bolts. Move slightly left and up easy terrain to the last bolt. From the stance at the last bolt move up over bulge and slight LEFT to easy terrain to anchor
Start on Between Rains.   At third bolt move right and climb steep thin face angling right then back left to anchors
content.protection: Spicy above last bolt.   TR by climbing Between Rains.

content.description: Scramble up low angle slab to first high bolt. Climb beyond second bolt. Go left to third/fourth bolt ( bolt on right is a different route) and power up face on small crimps and/or deadpoint, gaining cliff top, hand traverse right to the anchors.
Routes around the vertical face climb Machismo (5.11c/d) in Safe Harbor South.
